name: Home Design Star
description:
Get satisfaction from the interior design! Play with various colors and textures, create aesthetic home decor styles, and express your creativity. Access tons of relaxing episodes with pristine virtual rooms and sharpen your decorating skills.

Participate in Daily home design challenges such as designing a living space with a specific purpose (bedroom, living room, kitchen, or bathroom), using Pinterest inspired decor items and furniture. Learn about other people's designs and become a part of our dynamic interior decorator community.


How to play:

*Enter a daily challenge;
*As a designer, you are given a specified amount of cash to create your dream design;
*Select an item you wish to decorate;
*Scroll down through the options;
*Read the Design Brief and impress your fellow Designers by choosing the best combination of colors, textures, and materials;
*Vote for other players’ designs and have an impact on the results.


Design Star is an inspiring and relaxing game that allows you to develop your Interior Design skills while creating rooms of your dreams. Here, you are encouraged to explore and experiment.


Features:

*Relax by exploring impeccable designs in ultra-quality graphics;

*Win rewards through Daily Challenges;

*Play with realistic home decor inspired by Pinterest;

*Gain inspiration from top trending Pinterest home designs;

*Play with IKEA like furniture and apply your new ideas in your real life;

*Design, renovate and retouch the old buildings and rooms into modern homes

*Express yourself with an incredible variety of high-end designer furniture, lighting, flooring and other decor.


It's time to start a new creative hobby!


Design Star: Home Makeover is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money.
Enjoying Design Star? Join our vibrant home design community on:

-Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DesignStarApp
-Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/designstarapp/?hl=en
